name: Giztix Pte. Ltd
description: Operator of a transportation booking platform intended to check transportation and freight prices instantly. The company's platform manages fleets for free, books truck and tracks the shipment status in real time and gathers transporters for shippers for various types of full truckload services, enabling clients to compare shipping prices and book transportation services safely by starting a conversation with the transporter directly.
one_liner: Operator of a transportation booking platform intended to check transportation and freight prices instantly. The company's platform manages fleets for free, books truck and tracks the shipment status in real time and gathers transporters for shippers for various types of full truckload services, enabling clients to compare shipping prices and book transportation services safely by starting a conversation with the transporter directly.
